column1: 1 ^ Praise ye the Lord from the heavens~; praise ye him in the high places.
2 ^ Praise ye him all his angels~; praise ye him all his hosts.

column2: O sun and moon~; praise him

column3: and thou water that art above the heavens.

column1: 5 ^ Let them praise the name of the Lord~; for he spoke
column2: and they were made~; he commanded

column1: 6 ^ He hath established them for ever
column2: and for ages of ages~; he hath made a decree
column3: and it shall not pass away.

column1: 7 ^ Praise the Lord from the earth
column2: ye dragons and all ye deeps

column1: 11 ^ kings of the earth and all people
column2: princes and all judges of the earth

column1: 13 ^ let them praise the name of the Lord
column2: for exalted is the name of him alone~; the praise of him is above heaven and earth.

column1: 14 ^ And he hath exalted the horn of his people~; a hymn to all his saints
column3: to a people drawing nigh unto him.
